description.value:
You channel the inner strength of your mind, unleashing a barrage of psionic energy through the deadly weapons you wield.

You can cast occult spells using the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{Cast a Spell} activity. You're trained in occult spell attack rolls and occult spell DCs. Your key spellcasting ability for dervish archetype spells is Charisma and they are occult dervish spells.

You gain the psi cantrip @UUID[Compendium.the-longest-mile.dervish.Item.wLkMp60XTDQYqV6p]{Psionic Strike} which you can amplify by spending Focus Points. If you don't have one, you also gain a focus pool of 1 Focus Point, which you can use to amp your psi cantrips. You can Refocus by meditating on your new powers or performing a physical regimen.

You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.onde0SxLoxLBTnvm]{Double Slice} fighter feat. This serves as Double Slice for the purpose of meeting prerequisites.

You gain access to the @UUID[Compendium.the-longest-mile.dervish.Item.YCZg2etveOOeJJJT]{Gather Psi} action that allows you to to use actions with the Psi Burst trait.

Special You can't select another dedication feat until you gain two other feats from the @UUID[Compendium.the-longest-mile.journals.JournalEntry.Q4XlMqXr82pmrJHI]{Dervish} archetype.
